import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function Setting({ isDarkMode, toggleMode, FontSize, setFontSize }) { const [SmallFontSize, setSmallFontSize] = useState('fs-3'); useEffect(() => { // Set the default small font size based on the default font size (XL) handleSmallFontSizeChange('fs-1'); }, []); const handleFontSizeChange = (event) => { setFontSize(event.target.value); // Update font size based on the selected radio button handleSmallFontSizeChange(event.target.value); // Update small font size }; const handleSmallFontSizeChange = (size) => { switch (size) { case 'fs-1': setSmallFontSize('fs-3'); break; case 'fs-2': setSmallFontSize('fs-4'); break; case 'fs-3': setSmallFontSize('fs-5'); break; case 'fs-4': setSmallFontSize('fs-6'); break; case 'fs-5': setSmallFontSize('fs-6'); break; default: setSmallFontSize('fs-3'); } }; return ( <>
